Product Description

Use Upgraded Solar Panel

Our solar security lights equipped with newest monocrystalline silicon solar panel,up to 25% conversion rate,which can shorten the charging time. built in large capacity 2400 mah rechargeable battery,ensure Longer lighting time.

With Remote Control

Solar powered lights comes with a remote controller,you can turn on/off the light and select different modes by remote control without having to climb up on a ladder(NOTE: please take out the clear insulation sheet first when you use the remote control)

Weatherproof & Durable

Crafted from corrosion resistant ABS plastic and protected by the IP65 waterproof, The lifespan of light will be up to 50,000hours. you can install solar flood lights anywhere as you like, such as gardens, pergola, terraces, driveways, gates,backyard etc

Super Bright Lighting

Solar motion sensor lights equipped with 300 super bright LED light beads,It can produce up to 3000lm 7000K brightness, suitable as security lighting for your home.

5 Rotatable Lighting Heads

Solar wall lights has 5 swiveling lighting heads,the adjustable lamp cap can freely move up and down, left and right,which can meet various angles of irradiation.

Easy Setup

The solar led outdoor lights are easy installation, no annoying wires connect or adapters,only using the included screws to fix on any exterior & interior wall or all types of material including metal, wood or plastic.

2023 Newest Solar Lights For Outside Inside House – Super Bright LED Motion Detection Floodlights with 5 Lighting Heads

Warm Tips

1. When the solar panel is unplugged from the solar lamp; lighting mode 1,mode 2, mode 3 and mode 4 can work both at day and night.

2. When the solar panel is plugged into the solar lamp; lighting mode 1,mode 2 and mode 3 only works at night, the mode 4 can work both at day and night.

Note:

1. Please turn the solar motion sensing lights power switch to the “ON” position before first time using. then press the gear switch or use remote control to adjust the lighting mode.

2. The angle and direction of motion sensor should be adjusted to the best position, so that motion detecting lights has the largest detection range and the recommended height is 6-11 feet.

Upgraded 4 Lighting Modes: solar motion activated light has 4 lighting modes: Mode 1: the light turn on for 20s when detected movement at night. Mode 2: light turns on in dim mode at night, get brighter for 20s when detected movement. Mode 3: the light will always turn on and stay medium light at night with or without detecting motion. Mode 4: light turns on for 20 seconds when detects movements both in daytime and night.
Innovative 5 Lighting Heads Design: our solar wall lamps is equipped with 5 rotating lighting heads and pivoting solar panels,it can move up and down, left and right, easily adjust the lamp cap,solar panel and motion sensor to any angles as your requirement,up to 360° wide lighting angle,bring you a fantastic lighting experience.
Ultra Bright with 300LED Solar Power Lights: with 300 super bright LED light beads,It can produce up to 3000lm 7000K high brightness output,which can fully achieve the brightness required by daily life. equipped with upgraded PIR motion sensor, solar spot lights can detect up to 120 degree with a longer sensor length of 28feet,motion detection solar lights can sense people,animal,cars etc.
All Weather Resistant: solar garden lights is made of durable high-strength ABS material,reaching IP65 waterproof level,which can withstand many kinds of extreme weather, such as snow, frost,rain and high temperature etc,great led exterior flood lights for fence, balcony, pathway, patio,porch,deck,street,stairs,steps,yard etc

The ASUS Laptop L210MA is designed to help you be productive all day — even when you’re on the move. This compact and lightweight 11.6 inch laptop is powered by the latest Intel® processor and provides long lasting battery life. With eMMC storage and pre-loaded Windows 10 in S mode, this laptop offers full compatibility with a wide range of software and peripherals. This laptop is the best laptop for people on the go. *The actual transfer speed of USB 3.0, 3.1, 3.2 (Gen 1 and 2), and/or Type-C will vary depending on many factors including the processing speed of the host device, file attributes and other factors related to system configuration and your operating environment. Price: $219.99 - $186.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:34:51 UTC – Details)


The Levoit Core 400S Smart True HEPA Air Purifier, is the high-efficiency air purifier to clean a whole room properly. AirSight Plus technology scans the surrounding air for airborne particles as small as 0.3um, this air purifier focuses on real-time home conditions – this is more than just having an air purifier. Levoit engineers designed the air purifier’s internal structure to provide powerful air purification while maintaining noise levels as low as 24dB. 
Features:

  • Intelligently purifies the air in a 403 sq ft room 5x per hour
  • HEPASmart technology helps create a cleaner, healthier home – Our air purifiers are scientifically proven to capture particles as small as 0.3 microns including pollen, dust and more.
  • 360° filtration system uses activated carbon to remove gases and odors and a H13 True HEPA filter to capture 99.97% pollutants as small as 0.3 microns.
  • Automatically senses and reacts to changes in air quality – then reports pollution in real time on LCD screen and on your free VeSync Link app.
  • In the sleep mode, the air purifier monitors and purifies using the quiet settings, with a dimmed display and can be totally turned off.
  • Program your machine to turn off after pre-set intervals between 1 -12 hours.
  • Safe and easy to clean with low maintenance, easy-to-replace filters. With built-in notifications when they require replacing.
  • Using compatible voice control services, control your air purifier with simple, spoken instructions. Works with Alexa and Googlevoice Assistant.
  • Warning – unauthorized replacement filters are not tested or verified to perform at HEPA standard. Only authentic Levoit  filters are recommended to ensure a sealed system and proper functioning of the machine. The official Levoit Core 400S replacement filter can be found by searching “B08SQQK6K7” in the search bar.

LARGE COVERAGE: The top-performing Levoit Core 400S Smart True HEPA Air Purifier can purify large rooms, such as bedrooms, living rooms, kitchens, and basements. Purify a 403 ft² room 5x per hour and a 990 ft² room 2x per hour
3-STAGE FILTRATION: Filtration includes a Pre-Filter, H13 True HEPA Filter, which traps viruses, bacteria, pollen,dust, and pet dander, and a Custom High-Efficiency Activated Carbon Filter that helps neutralize odors, cooking and wildfire smoke, and VOCs
WHISPER-LEVEL QUIET: Keep the Core 400S running throughout the night, as Sleep Mode uses the lowest fan speed (24dB) to create a sleep-friendly space that’s as quiet as falling leave
COMBAT ALLERGIES AND ASTHMA: Powerful air purification during allergy and wildfire seasons helps capture allergens that cause sneezing, congestion, breathing difficulties, and other symptoms
VIEW AIR QUALITY: The laser dust sensor scans the surrounding air for airborne particles, continuously updating the PM2.5 display and creating graphs in the VeSync app so you can see how your air quality has improved
HANDS-FREE VOICE COMMAND: Hands-free control with Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant allows you to control settings when your hands are full with cooking, caring for babies and children, or playing with pets
SCHEDULE SETTINGS TO MATCH YOUR ROUTINE: Program the air purifier to use different modes and fan speeds at certain times, so you can have your week planned in advance. With scheduling, you never have to worry about forgetting to change your settings
TRUSTWORTHY AND SAFE: The Core 400S is Energy Star and FCC certified, ETL listed, and a recipient of the German Design Award (2021) and iF Design Award (2021). Only use Levoit replacement filters (search B08SQQK6K7) for best results and product performance

From the brand

Make life better by controlling everything in the palm of your hand. From intuitive lights to automated home devices, our smart products lineup elevates moods, moments, and beyond.

Top-tier quality made accessible for any home.

Smart Devices

For the Planet

Part of our mission is to make homes safer, cozier, and happier to live in. And that includes our biggest home – the planet.

That’s why we’ve made sure every Vont product comes with a link to an online instruction manual, so your devices are always ready to make life easier, right out of the box.

DRIVE IN A GALAXY OF COLOR LIGHTS | CUSTOMIZE YOUR CAR – Choose from 16 million colors and 30 unique scene modes. DIY effects, adjust brightness, and personalize this RGB LED strip to transform your daily drives into vibrant road trips.
QUICK SETUP | EASY CONTROL W/ VONT HOME APP – Just plug it in, power on, and lay out the 21-feet, single-design strip light suitable for various car models. Secure with the cable ties/stickers included and wirelessly control with the app or via a convenient controller.
﻿LIGHTS JAM W/ YOUR FAVORITE BEATS | ENJOY MUSIC MODE – Vont Car Lights built-in mic syncs with your car’s music in real-time, letting you experience a colorful car karaoke with your favorite beats.
﻿SAFE TO USE & WATER-RESISTANT – The interior strip light’s robust built comes with safety features to make you feel extra secure. It’s flame retardant, water-resistant, has a high-temp resistance, and is harmless to kids.
﻿24/7 CUSTOMER CARE & LIFETIME WARRANTY – Covered for life, it’s warranted against loss, theft, and defects in materials and workmanship as long as you own your car lights. Vont Customer Satisfaction Wizards are with you 24/7 – for life.

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

Product Description

Lenovo IdeaPad 1i

Everything you need, anywhere you need it

1

2

3

4

5

6

Everything you need, anywhere you need it

The IdeaPad 1i (14″ Intel) is exactly what you need in an everyday use laptop. Watch shows on an 14″ HD display with a razor-thin frame. Listen to rich and clear sound from two Dolby Audio speakers.

Small size, big productivity

Communicate with friends and family. Enjoy entertainment. Get your work done. Get the reliable performance that’s expected from Intel powered PCs.

Built for Travel

14″ diagonally with a weight of just ‎2.87 pounds, the IdeaPad 1i is ready to travel wherever life takes you. Plus, with up to 10 hours of battery life, you’re ready for plenty of productivity.

Switching out of S Mode in Windows

Windows 11 in S Mode is a safety feature that will only allow apps that are downloaded from the Microsoft Store to run on a computer. If you disable S Mode, you can’t turn it back on.

I/O Ports

1. Power connector, Connect to power with the included power cord and ac power adapter.

2. USB (3.2 Gen 1) Type-A connector, Connect a USB-compatible device, such as a USB keyboard, a USB mouse, a USB storage device, or a USB printer.

3. Connect to a compatible digital audio device or video monitor, such as an HDTV.

4. Connect external storage or data devices.

Note: An appropriate adapter may be needed for connecting external devices. This connector cannot be used to connect external display devices.

5. Connect headphones or headsets with a 3.5 mm (0.14 inch), 4-pole plug.

Note: This jack does not support standalone external microphones. If you use headsets, choose one with a single plug.

6. SD card slot. Insert an SD card or a MultiMediaCard (MMC) into the slot for data transfer or storage.

7. Connect USB-compatible devices, such as a USB mouse, USB storage device, or USB printer.

Technical Specifications

Processor Intel Celeron N4020 (2 Cores 2 Threads, base clock speed 1.1GHz, Max turbo to 2.8GHz, 4MB L3 Cache) Display 14″ HD (1366×768) TN, 220nits, Anti-glare, 45% NTSC Graphics Integrated Intel UHD Graphics 600 Memory 4GB DDR4 2400MHz RAM Storage 256GB PCIe NVMe M.2 SSD Networking Intel Wi-Fi 6 AX201 802.11AX (2 x 2) + Bluetooth 5.1 Operating System Windows 11 Home in S Mode Audio 2 x 1.5W speakers with Dolby Audio Battery Integrated 42Wh, Up to 10 hours Camera HD 720p with Privacy Shutter Security Firmware TPM 2.0 Keyboard Non-Backlit, English Dimensions 12.8″ x 8.52″ x 0.70″ Weight 2.87 lbs

IdeaPad 1i, an entry-level, light workload configuration laptop featuring lightweight and fast processing, perfect for everyday multitasking, loaded with Windows 11 Home in S Mode, which provides a Fast, Safe, and Secure, Chromebook-like experience. IdeaPad 1i is an ideal laptop for School Education, Light Work, Online Meetings, and Video Streaming
Intel Celeron N4020 (2 Cores 2 Threads, base clock speed 1.1GHz, Max turbo to 2.8GHz, 4MB L3 Cache); 4GB DDR4 2400MHz Memory; 256GB PCIe NVMe M.2 SSD
14″ HD (1366×768) Anti-glare Screen, Energy-efficient LED backlight; Integrated Intel UHD Graphics 600 – Expandable to 1 monitor via HDMI. Max resolution of the External Monitors: 4K (3840*2160) @30Hz
1 x USB-A 2.0; 1 x USB-A 3.2 Gen 1; 1 x USB-C 3.2 Gen 1 (support data transfer only); 1 x HDMI 1.4b; 1 x Card reader; 1 x Headphone / microphone combo jack (3.5mm); Intel Wi-Fi 6 AX201 802.11AX (2 x 2) + Bluetooth 5.1
Everything is Original from Manufacturer. 1-Year Limited Warranty. You can switch to Windows 10 Home from S mode (but you can’t switch from Home to S mode); You are always recommended to check the requirements and compatibility of any software you will install on your new computer before you make the purchase

Product Description

Mileseey 165 Feet Laser Measure

Better Quality and Unceasing Innovation

Mileseey was established in 1998. With over 20 years of manufacturing and R & D experience in the measuring instruments industry, he works on technological innovation, product usability improvements, and the creation of more economical and stable solutions.

Mileseey is Dedicated to Providing You with the Highest Quality Products and Satisfied After-Sales Service.

Higher Accuracy, Higher Efficiency

Two bubble levels provide more precise measurement compared to one bubble; Measuring range up to 165 Ft, remarkable accuracy reach ±1/16 inch; Fast measurement speed improve your work efficieny greatly.

Product Specifications Measuring range: 165ft / 50m Distance measurement precision: ±1/16 inch(±2mm) Units: m/feet/inches Display: 2.0 inche Large LCD Backlit Laser Level/Type: Class II/635nm, <1mW Max storage: 20 units Battery type: 1.5V 2*AAA(Included) Auto laser power-off: 20s / Auto power-off: 150s

Measure Everywhere

Measured directly, by using the pythagorean theorem (a2+b2=c2).

Area Measurement.

S2 can calculate the area of a square or rectangular room or space by measuring its length and width and multiplying the two values.

Quick measurement in 0.5s

There are two photosensitive holes and a large optical lens. During the measurement process, the light transmittance is increased by 50%, and the response time is 0.5s. It can better withstand strong light interference and can still be clearly read under external sunlight Compared with other laser measurement, it provides more stable and accurate measurement.

Conversion of 4 Units

Press and hold the Units button for 2 seconds to freely change the units to M / In / Ft / Ft + in, which can meet your different measurement needs.

Quick and Accurate Measure to Easy Your Life Perfectly

Compact Size with Multiple Functions – Continuous & Pythagoras & Single Distance Measurement.

Based on measured Length, width and height, gets you smart volume and area calculations, no need of manual operation any more.

Waterproof & Dust-proof to Protect tool

Features IP54 waterproof level, can protect the laser distance measure normally to the maximum extent, which offers a variety of environmental work for using.

Small Body fits in hand perfectly, gives you convenient operation; You can put it in your pocket or carry it everywhere.

Warm Tips 1:It is recommended that you avoid direct sunlight. 2:As strong sunlight weakens the laser energy and can affect accuracy and measurement range, measurement is not recommended for outdoor use. 3:This equipment is a class 2 laser product. Be careful not to touch the user’s eyes. 4:If the sun’s diffuse reflection is weak, use a highly reflective tool.

★ LCD BACKLIGHT & MUTE SETTING ★ Large backlight screen provides you with a better visibility in dark areas; Mute setting allows you turn on or off the measure beep at your will, suitable for using in library, classroom and other quite places,the laser level is ideal for home, construction and industries, especially in large areas such as rooms, apartments, buildings, real estates, factories, warehouses, etc
★ MULTIPLE MEASUREMENT FEATURES ★ Area, distance, length, volume, continuous measurement, Pythagorean method-three points; Addition and subtraction; Low battery indication; 20 groups data memory; Manually delete data; Auto shut down after 150s without any operation to save power
